note:
Beer brewing, wild yeast harvesting, wine making, and other adventures in fermentation with (very little) help from a dog. Rarely updated website at mutedog.beer

I'm in the PNW across the Columbia River and a bit east from Portland, OR

fields.value: I didn't buy commercial yeast for 7 years, still rarely buy it.
